name: Cleaver
description: A heavy knife for cutting meat.

name: Club
description: A hefty stick, chair leg, or workman’s hammer

name: Dagger
description: A short sidearm, suitable for slashing or stabbing. The "Sharp" property does not apply when thrown.

name: Hatchet
description: A small axe suitable for throwing

name: Sickle
description: A farmer’s tool of dubious sharpness. May be modified by a blacksmith to lose the Improvised trait, for 50 gold.

name: Stiletto
description: A stabbing knife, long and sharp. Ignores BC from chainmail.

name: Tanto
description: A short slashing blade with an angular tip.
